001package net.tvburger.jdl.linalg;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic;
005
006public interface Vector<N extends Number> extends Transposable<Vector<N>>, NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
007
008    int getDimensions();
009
010    default boolean isRowVector() {
011        return !isColumnVector();
012    }
013
014    boolean isColumnVector();
015
016    Matrix<N> asMatrix();
017
018    Array<N> asArray();
019
020    N get(int i);
021
022    Vector<N> multiply(N value);
023
024    Vector<N> divide(N value);
025
026    Vector<N> add(N value);
027
028    Vector<N> subtract(N value);
029
030    Vector<N> add(Vector<N> vector);
031
032    Vector<N> subtract(Vector<N> vector);
033
034    N dotProduct(Vector<N> vector);
035
036    N norm();
037
038    @Override
039    int hashCode();
040
041    @Override
042    boolean equals(Object obj);
043
044    default void print() {
045        print(null);
046    }
047
048    default void print(String name) {
049        asMatrix().print(name);
050    }
051}
